title: If I get downvoted, let it be but I need to say it here.
selftext:
I think KCR is right when he took 600 vehicles to neighboring state. It hurts to see tax payers money go to dump but let’s be real, how else do you make a statement in Indian politics. Specially, when the politics in the country is deviated from real issues and media won’t stop chanting yogi-modi-mama-Amit.  
  
He dealt with more tough situations in the past during Telangana agitation and only thing that might stop him is his age. 


https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/show-of-strength-worrisome-sharad-pawar-on-kcrs-600-car-convoy-in-maharashtra-4158526
comments:
>It hurts to see tax payers money go to dump but let’s be real, how else do you make a statement in Indian politics.

It's not a dick measuring contest, they can do their fucking jobs right to make a statement in Indian politics.

But I don't think people voted for him and paying his government taxes so that he can make a STATEMENT using 600 cars.  
Anyway he won't win even a single seat outside Telangana ever.
